c74object.name: triggerlimit~
c74object.digest: Filter out non-zero values that are too close together
c74object.description: triggerlimit~ limits the rate of input triggers (non-zero samples) to a maximum rate specified in samples. The initial intention of this object was to avoid very rapid triggering in situations that would result in excessive CPU usage.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Output filters out non-zero values that are too close together - otherwise passing the input value
